labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Keyboard shortcut skips the now visible channel
data.expected_result: Keyboard shortcut switches to the now visible channel
data.short_description: Keyboard shortcuts fail to switch to hidden but visible channels
data.steps_to_repro: - Mute a channel - Hide muted channels - Get pinged in a muted channel - Try using keyboard shortcuts to switch to now visible channel
